name: Galvan Magen
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Fiery End
entries: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The magen makes two Shocking Touch attacks.

actions.name: Shocking Touch
entries: {@atk ms} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target (the magen has advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal). 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) lightning damage.

actions.name: Static Discharge {@recharge 5}
entries: The magen discharges a lightning bolt in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw (with disadvantage if the creature is wearing armor made of metal), taking 22 (4d10 damage) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
